about_the_game:
"Awara" is a captivating platform game set in the lush landscapes of French Guiana. The game offers both the excitement of the platform genre and a glimpse into the culture and environment of this unique region.

The main objective in "Awara" is simple yet engaging: harvest awaras, a tropical fruit typical of French Guiana. Adding an extra layer of strategy and exhilaration are special awaras that grant players speed boosts. While each collected awara contributes to your overall score, picking up a rotten one won't decrease your score but will affect your character's health.

Who Is It For?
The game is suitable for people of all ages, particularly those who enjoy platform games or are interested in exploring new cultures.

Where to Buy?
"Awara" is available exclusively for PC through the Steam store.


"Awara" is more than just a platform game; it provides a cultural journey allowing you to explore French Guiana while having a great time. With the added feature of special awaras that provide speed boosts, the game offers a varied and exciting experience for players of all skill levels.

short_description: Awara is a platform game whose story takes place in French Guiana. The goal of the game is to collect awaras while avoiding rotten or toxic awaras. To do this, you will have to jumd and slip in order to evolve in the forest.
